numerology.title: What do numbers tell you?
numerology.expression_number_desc: Berechnet aus Ihrem Namen, spiegelt diese Zahl potenzielle Themen und Eigenschaften in Ihrem Leben wider.
numerology.shadow_side_footer: These aspects can be transformed with awareness. Accepting the shadow is not empowering it - it is integrating it.
numerology.karmic_debt_message: Your chart has {debts} karmic debt. Tap for details.
numerology.ancient_secret_desc: Numerologie ist eine alte Weisheit, in der das Universum in einer mathematischen Sprache spricht. Von Pythagoras bis zur Kabbala kannten alle esoterischen Traditionen die Kraft der Zahlen. Ihr Geburtsdatum und Name tragen die Schwingung, die Ihre Seele in diese Welt brachte. Jede Zahl ist eine Frequenz, eine Energie, ein Thema zur Erforschung. Was Sie hier sehen, ist kein Zufall - es ist ein Werkzeug zur Selbstreflexion.
numerology.kadim_content: Since Pythagoras, sages have known that numbers carry the hidden language of the universe. Your life path number is not just a digit - it is the vibration your soul brought into this world, the unique melody the universe gave you. To hear this melody, you first need silence.
numerology.karmic_13_desc: A karmic debt arising from laziness and irresponsibility. Must be balanced through hard work and discipline in this life.
numerology.karmic_14_desc: A debt from misusing freedom. Learning responsibility and moderation is required in this life.
numerology.karmic_16_desc: A debt from ego and relationship issues. Requires humility and inner transformation.
numerology.karmic_19_desc: A debt from misusing power and authority. Learning the balance of independence and helping others is required.
numerology.karmic_default_desc: This number carries a karmic debt and requires certain lessons to be learned in this life.

reiki.title: Reiki
reiki.subtitle: Universal Life Energy
reiki.description: Reiki means 'universal life energy' in Japanese. This energy flowing through the hands activates the body's natural healing mechanisms and dissolves energy blocks. It provides stress reduction, relaxation, and holistic healing.

kyo_dake_wa.description: Focus on the present moment. The past is gone, the future hasn't come yet. You can only control today.

ikaru_na.description: Anger depletes your energy and harms your health. Accept your emotions but let them go.

shinpai_suna.description: Worry is giving energy to things that haven't happened. Live with trust and surrender.

kansha_shite.description: Gratitude is one of the highest vibrations. Find a blessing in everything.

gyo_wo_hageme.description: Whatever work you do, do it with integrity and dedication. Add meaning to your life.

hito_ni_shinsetsu_ni.description: Compassion and kindness are universal healing energies. Be kind to everyone, including yourself.

heart.name: Heart Chakra
heart.reiki_position: Place hands on center of chest

throat.name: Throat Chakra
throat.reiki_position: Place hands on either side of throat

crown.name: Crown Chakra
crown.reiki_position: Place hands on top of head

self_reiki.title: Self-Reiki Practice
steps: Sit or lie in a comfortable position
Close your eyes and take several deep breaths
Set your intention: "I open myself to healing energy"
Place hands on top of your head (3-5 min)
Place hands over your eyes (3-5 min)
Place hands on your throat (3-5 min)
Place hands on your heart (3-5 min)
Place hands on solar plexus (3-5 min)
Place hands below navel (3-5 min)
Finish with gratitude

daily_cleansing.title: Daily Energy Cleansing
steps: Rub your hands together when you wake up
Feel your hands warming and energy flowing
Cleanse your energy field by moving hands around your aura
Release negative energy into the ground
Start the day with positive intentions

distance_reiki.title: Distance Reiki
steps: Get permission from the person you'll send healing to (mentally)
Visualize the person or situation
Draw the Hon Sha Ze Sho Nen symbol (if applicable)
Send love and healing intention
Feel the energy reaching them
Finish with gratitude

reiki.tip: Working with a Reiki master is recommended for Reiki attunement. These practices can help develop energy awareness even if you haven't been attuned.

houses.title: Personal Houses
houses.subtitle: 12 personal houses and life areas
houses.section_subtitle: Discover different areas of your life
houses.view_house_on_chart: View This House on My Chart

1.title: 1st House - House of Self
1.description: Represents your personality, physical appearance and how you present yourself to the world. The rising sign rules this house.

2.title: 2nd House - House of Money & Values
2.description: Represents your material values, ability to earn money and self-worth.

3.title: 3rd House - House of Communication
3.description: Represents your thinking style, communication skills and relationships with your close environment.

4.title: 4th House - House of Family & Roots
4.description: Represents your family, home, emotional foundations and the later period of your life.

5.title: 5th House - House of Creativity & Love
5.description: Represents your creative expression, romance, children and sense of entertainment.

6.title: 6th House - House of Health & Service
6.description: Represents your daily routines, work habits and physical health.

7.title: 7th House - House of Marriage & Partnership
7.description: Represents your serious relationships, marriage and all types of partnerships.

8.title: 8th House - House of Transformation
8.description: Represents deep transformation, shared resources, sexuality and spiritual rebirth.

9.title: 9th House - House of Philosophy & Travel
9.description: Represents higher education, long journeys, philosophy and spiritual quest.

10.title: 10th House - House of Career & Status
10.description: Represents your career, social status, goals and achievements.

11.title: 11th House - House of Friends & Ideals
11.description: Represents your friendships, social groups, future hopes and ideals.

12.title: 12th House - House of Subconscious & Secrets
12.description: Represents your subconscious, hidden enemies, spiritual journey and karmic lessons.

houses.birth_time_required_desc: Accurate birth time is needed to calculate house positions
houses.no_planets_info: No planets in this house - this doesn't mean this area is inactive. The sign ruling this house and its ruler planet show how this area operates in your life.

1.title: Gate of Self
1.description: The first house is your soul's first touch to this world - the first breath, the first glance, the first sense of 'I'. This house is your 'cosmic mask'; it shows how your soul chooses to present itself to the world. {signName} here as rising colors your approach to life, your physical appearance and how others first perceive you.
1.shadow: Shadow aspect: Hiding behind the mask, placing excessive importance on appearance.
1.gift: Gift: The ability to experience every moment as a new beginning.

2.title: Temple of Values
2.description: The second house is the sacred temple of the material world. Money is not just paper - it's a reflection of your value system. {signName} positioned in this house shapes your earning style, what you value and your need for security. This house carries the spiritual dimension of the verb 'to possess'.
2.shadow: Shadow aspect: Seeking security only in material things, greed or excessive thriftiness.
2.gift: Gift: Developing abundance consciousness and using resources wisely.

3.title: Garden of the Mind
3.description: The third house is the sacred space of mind and communication. {signName} here determines your thinking style, speaking manner and way of learning. This house also governs relationships with siblings, neighbors and close environment. Here the mind becomes either a garden or a forest - the seeds you plant grow.
3.shadow: Shadow aspect: Superficiality, gossip, scattered attention.
3.gift: Gift: The power to unite worlds through words.

4.title: Root of the Soul
4.description: The fourth house is the deepest point of the chart - the root of your soul. {signName} here shapes family patterns, the need for emotional security and the concept of 'home'. This house carries the legacy of ancestors and the oldest impressions in your subconscious. You cannot understand where you're going without knowing where you came from.
4.shadow: Shadow aspect: Getting stuck in the past, blindly repeating family patterns.
4.gift: Gift: Deep emotional wisdom and capacity for inner peace.

5.title: Creator's Stage
5.description: The fifth house is the stage where your soul finds creative expression. {signName} here colors your creativity style, romantic expression, relationship with children and approach to 'play'. This house is where the joy of the heart springs forth - the home of the child within.
5.shadow: Shadow aspect: Ego inflation, attention addiction, risky behaviors.
5.gift: Gift: Pure creative energy and the ability to inspire others.

6.title: Workshop of Service
6.description: The sixth house is the home of daily life's sacred rituals. {signName} here determines work routines, health habits and approach to service. This house carries the answer to 'how do I serve?' Your body is a temple - the sixth house is its care manual.
6.shadow: Shadow aspect: Obsessive perfectionism, serving others while neglecting yourself.
6.gift: Gift: The capacity to create order and healing.

7.title: Beyond the Mirror
7.description: The seventh house is the mirror of the 'other' - the home of relationships, partnerships and marriage. {signName} here shapes the qualities you seek in partners, your relationship style and the concept of 'we'. Everyone who appears before you reflects something inside you - this house is that mirror.
7.shadow: Shadow aspect: Defining yourself through relationships, codependent relationships.
7.gift: Gift: Creating deep connections and seeing yourself in others.

8.title: Well of Transformation
8.description: The eighth house is the home of the death-rebirth cycle - the place of deepest transformations. {signName} here determines your coping style with crises, shared resources, sexuality and approach to mysteries. This house requires the courage to face shadows.
8.shadow: Shadow aspect: Control obsession, manipulation, fear of loss.
8.gift: Gift: The power to rise again from every pile of ashes like a phoenix.

9.title: Quest for Truth
9.description: The ninth house is the home of the search for meaning - philosophy, higher education, distant journeys and spiritual expansion. {signName} here shapes your belief system, teaching/learning style and way of seeing the 'big picture'. This house pursues the question 'why?'
9.shadow: Shadow aspect: Dogmatism, blind faith, inability to stay in place.
9.gift: Gift: Distilling wisdom from experience and enlightening others.

10.title: Crown of the Peak
10.description: The tenth house is the zenith of the chart - the home of career, social status and life mission. {signName} here determines the mark you want to leave in the world, your career style and relationship with authority figures. This house is the answer to 'who do I want to be in the world?'
10.shadow: Shadow aspect: Status obsession, workaholism, sacrifice for success.
10.gift: Gift: The capacity to leave a lasting and meaningful mark in the world.

11.title: Collective of Dreams
11.description: The eleventh house is the home of collective dreams, ideals and friendships. {signName} here shapes your social circle, group dynamics and vision for the future. This house is about finding your 'tribe' - what you cannot change alone, you transform together.
11.shadow: Shadow aspect: Losing individuality for group conformity, utopian dreams.
11.gift: Gift: Maintaining individual uniqueness while serving the collective good.

12.title: Gateway to Infinity
12.description: The twelfth house is the most mysterious corner of the chart - the home of the subconscious, spirituality, karma and dissolution. {signName} here carries subconscious patterns, your spiritual journey and 'letting go' lessons. This house is the gateway beyond ego, to infinity.
12.shadow: Shadow aspect: Tendency to escape, victim role, disconnection from reality.
12.gift: Gift: Boundless compassion and the experience of universal unity.

deep_interpretations.aries:
[[Widder]] befindet sich am Ausgangspunkt des [[Archetypes]] und repr√§sentiert das Prinzip "Ich bin". Diese Periode, die mit der [[Fr√ºhlingstagundnachtgleiche]] beginnt, spiegelt die Energie der Wiedergeburt und des Wachstums in der Natur wider.

Unter der Herrschaft von [[Mars]] sind Widder aktionsorientiert. Ihre nat√ºrliche Verbindung zum [[1. Haus]] bestimmt Identit√§t, k√∂rperliche Erscheinung und wie man sich der Welt n√§hert. Das [[Feuer]]-Element bietet Mut und Leidenschaft, w√§hrend die [[Kardinale]] Qualit√§t F√ºhrung und Initiative bringt.

In der evolution√§ren Selbstwahrnehmung repr√§sentiert Widder den Beginn der [[Seelenreise]]. Es macht die ersten Schritte in der Ego-Entwicklung und dem Individuationsprozess. [[Schatten]]-Aspekte beinhalten Ungeduld und Handeln ohne Nachdenken.

Planeten im Widder zeigen generell schnelle, direkte und wettbewerbsorientierte Energie. W√§hrend [[Mars]] [[R√ºckl√§ufig]]-Perioden ist es vorteilhaft, diese Energie auf innere Motivation zu lenken.
deep_interpretations.taurus:
[[Stier]] ist das zweite Zeichen des [[Archetypes]] und repr√§sentiert das Prinzip "Ich besitze". Als stabilste Form des [[Erde]]-Elements verwaltet Stier Werte und Ressourcen.

Unter der Herrschaft von [[Venus]] zeigt Stier tiefe Wertsch√§tzung f√ºr sinnliche Erfahrungen und Sch√∂nheit. Ihre nat√ºrliche Verbindung zum [[2. Haus]] umfasst Selbstwert, materielle Ressourcen und Talente.

Die [[Fixe]] Qualit√§t gibt Stier Ausdauer und Entschlossenheit. Einmal begonnene Projekte werden bis zur Fertigstellung fortgesetzt. Dies kann jedoch auch zum [[Schatten]]-Aspekt der Sturheit f√ºhren.

Planeten im Stier zeigen langsame aber entschlossene Energie. [[Venus]]-Transite zeigen wichtige Perioden besonders f√ºr Stier und [[Waage]]-Zeichen an.
deep_interpretations.gemini:
[[Zwillinge]] repr√§sentiert das Prinzip "Ich denke" und ist das erste [[Luft]]-Zeichen des [[Archetypes]]. Unter [[Merkur]]-Herrschaft sind geistige Beweglichkeit und Kommunikationsf√§higkeiten stark.

Ihre nat√ºrliche Verbindung zum [[3. Haus]] umfasst die unmittelbare Umgebung, Geschwister, kurze Reisen und grundlegende Kommunikation. Die [[Ver√§nderliche]] Qualit√§t bietet die F√§higkeit, sich anzupassen und flexibel zu sein.

Die [[Dualit√§ts]]-Symbolik der Zwillinge - Zwillingsgeschwister - repr√§sentiert die zwei Aspekte des Geistes: rational und intuitiv. Diese Energie, manchmal als zerstreut wahrgenommen, ist tats√§chlich die F√§higkeit, mehrere Perspektiven zu sehen.

[[Merkur R√ºckl√§ufig]]-Perioden sind besonders wichtig f√ºr Zwillinge. Diese Zeiten sind wertvoll f√ºr Introspektion und R√ºckblick. Der [[Schatten]]-Aspekt ist Oberfl√§chlichkeit und Unentschlossenheit.
deep_interpretations.cancer:
[[Krebs]] ist das vierte Zeichen des [[Archetypes]] und repr√§sentiert die [[Kardinale]] Form des [[Wasser]]-Elements. Mit dem Prinzip "Ich f√ºhle" verk√∂rpert es emotionale Intelligenz und Intuition.

Unter [[Mond]]-Herrschaft zeigen Krebse emotionale Tiefe und sch√ºtzende Instinkte. Ihre nat√ºrliche Verbindung zum [[4. Haus]] umfasst Heim, Familienwurzeln, innere Welt und emotionale Sicherheit.

Der [[Mutter-Archetyp]] resoniert stark mit Krebs. N√§hrende Energie und F√ºrsorgef√§higkeit sind nat√ºrlich entwickelt. [[Mondphasen]] sind besonders wirksam f√ºr Krebs-Geborene.

[[Schatten]]-Aspekte beinhalten √úberbesch√ºtzung, emotionale Manipulation und Tendenz, in der Vergangenheit festzuh√§ngen. Das Setzen von [[emotionalen Grenzen]] zu lernen ist die evolution√§re Aufgabe.
deep_interpretations.leo:

canonical.losing_question: What does losing someone in a dream mean?
canonical.searching_question: What does searching for something in a dream mean?
canonical.past_question: What does someone from the past appearing in a dream mean?
canonical.flying_question: What does flying in a dream mean?
canonical.voiceless_question: What does being unable to speak in a dream mean?
canonical.darkness_question: What does a dark place in a dream mean?
canonical.unable_to_fly_question: What does being unable to fly in a dream mean?
canonical.lost_question: What does being lost in a dream mean?
canonical.running_question: What does running away in a dream mean?
canonical.falling_question: What does falling in a dream mean?
canonical.water_question: What does seeing water in a dream mean?

falling.short_answer_1: Falling dreams usually reflect a feeling of loss of control.
falling.short_answer_2: They appear when we feel like things are slipping away from us.
falling.short_answer_3: Waking up while falling is your subconscious's reflex to wake you.
falling.meaning_1: More common during times of uncertainty.
falling.meaning_2: You might be worried about work, relationships, or health.
falling.meaning_3: The speed of the fall shows the intensity of anxiety.
falling.recurring_2: Look at what makes you feel unstable in life.
falling.recurring_3: Accepting what you cannot control can bring relief.

water.short_answer_1: Water symbolizes the subconscious and emotions.
water.short_answer_2: The state of water reflects your inner world.
water.short_answer_3: Calm water shows peace, turbulent water shows turmoil.
water.state_title: What Does the Water's State Tell You?
water.state_1: Clear water: Mental clarity and emotional balance.
water.state_2: Murky water: Uncertainty or suppressed emotions.
water.state_3: Flowing water: Harmony with life's flow.
water.state_4: Still water: Time for introspection and reflection.
water.emotion_1: Swimming: Being at peace with emotions.
water.emotion_2: Falling into water: Emotions taking control.
water.recurring_1: You're trying to process an emotional issue.
water.recurring_2: There may be a need for inner cleansing.
water.recurring_3: You're learning to trust your intuition more.

flying.short_answer_1: Flying dreams reflect the desire for freedom and transcending limits.
flying.short_answer_2: Shows you've taken or want to take control.
flying.short_answer_3: The ease of flight symbolizes the flow in your life.
flying.feeling_1: Enjoyable flight: Confidence and sense of success.
flying.feeling_3: Fear of falling: Insecurity or doubt.
flying.meaning_1: Desire to break free from restrictions.
flying.cant_fly_1: You're struggling to believe in yourself.
flying.cant_fly_2: An obstacle is holding you back.
flying.cant_fly_3: It might be time to let go of control.

running.short_answer_1: Running dreams show the desire to escape from a situation or emotion.
running.short_answer_2: There might be something you're avoiding confronting.
running.short_answer_3: Being caught while running makes you feel escape isn't working.
running.meaning_1: There's a challenging situation in your life.
running.meaning_2: You might be running from responsibility or conflict.
running.meaning_3: What you're running from is usually within yourself.
running.from_1: From someone familiar: Unresolved issue with that person.
running.from_2: From a monster: Your own fears.
running.from_3: From vague danger: General state of anxiety.
running.recurring_1: There's a decision you've been putting off.
running.recurring_2: It might be time to face rather than run.
running.recurring_3: A dream where the escape ends shows the solution has begun.

lost.short_answer_1: Being lost reflects a feeling of losing direction and uncertainty.
lost.short_answer_2: Shows you don't know where life is taking you.
lost.short_answer_3: Could be a search for identity or purpose.
lost.where_1: City: Lost direction in social life.
lost.where_4: Familiar place: You're questioning what you know.
lost.meaning_1: You're struggling to make a decision.
lost.meaning_2: You feel you've lost control of your life.
lost.meaning_3: You're searching for who you are or what you want.
lost.find_2: Getting help: You're open to accepting support.

losing.short_answer_1: Losing someone dreams usually reflect fear of separation.
losing.short_answer_2: Doesn't have to be a real loss, it's a feeling of losing connection.
losing.short_answer_3: There may be unresolved feelings about that person.
losing.who_1: A loved one: Your attachment and fear of loss.
losing.who_2: A stranger: Your connection to yourself.
losing.who_3: A child: Innocence within or new beginnings.
losing.meaning_1: You might be experiencing fear of change.
losing.meaning_2: You feel distance in a relationship.
losing.recurring_1: Your fear of loss may have deepened.
losing.recurring_2: There's something you need to discuss with that person.
losing.recurring_3: You're seeking balance between independence and attachment.

past.short_answer_1: Someone from the past symbolizes unfinished feelings.
past.short_answer_2: It might be about that era, not that person.
past.short_answer_3: The subconscious is processing an old issue.
past.who_3: Someone who passed: Grief process or longing.
past.who_4: Someone from childhood: Past trauma or nostalgia.
past.meaning_1: The emotion you experienced then is still active.
past.meaning_2: A current situation may have triggered the past.
past.meaning_3: It may be time to forgive or let go.
past.recurring_1: You need to resolve something about that person.
past.recurring_2: The past is affecting the present.
past.recurring_3: Time to separate yourself from that era.

searching.short_answer_1: Searching dreams reflect feelings of lack or loss.
searching.short_answer_2: Shows you're chasing something in life.
searching.short_answer_3: What you're searching for explains what you need.
searching.what_1: An object: A lost trait or ability.
searching.what_2: A person: Need for connection or relationship.
searching.what_3: A place: Search for security or belonging.
searching.what_4: Vague: Search for direction in life.
searching.meaning_2: You're looking for answers but don't know where.
searching.meaning_3: You might be in a period of inner searching.
searching.not_found_1: There's something you're not ready for yet.
searching.not_found_2: What you're looking for might be within you.

darkness.short_answer_1: Darkness symbolizes the unknown and unexplored inner world.
darkness.short_answer_2: There may be emotions or thoughts you're not aware of.
darkness.short_answer_3: Can be read as an invitation to discovery, not fear.
darkness.action_title: What Did You Do in the Dark?
darkness.action_3: Were afraid: You're wary of the unknown.
darkness.action_4: Searched for light: Looking for clarity and meaning.
darkness.meaning_1: You're in an uncertain period in life.
darkness.meaning_2: There are parts of yourself you haven't met.
darkness.meaning_3: You're suppressing a secret or hidden emotion.
darkness.recurring_2: You're being invited on an inner journey.
darkness.recurring_3: Light comes after the darkness passes.

voiceless.short_answer_1: Being voiceless reflects feeling unable to express yourself.
voiceless.why_1: Voice didn't come out: Suppressed emotions.
voiceless.why_3: Screamed but nothing came out: Intense frustration.
voiceless.meaning_2: You can't express yourself on some matter.
voiceless.recurring_1: You're struggling to make your voice heard.
voiceless.recurring_3: There's someone you need to talk to.

unable_to_fly.short_answer_1: Being unable to fly reflects feeling you can't use your potential.
unable_to_fly.short_answer_2: You perceive an obstacle or limitation.
unable_to_fly.short_answer_3: You want freedom but something holds you back.
unable_to_fly.why_2: Fear: You're afraid of success or failure.
unable_to_fly.why_3: Falling: You feel a lack of confidence.
unable_to_fly.why_4: Physical obstacle: External conditions limiting you.
unable_to_fly.meaning_1: You're struggling to believe in yourself.
unable_to_fly.meaning_2: You have a fear of missing an opportunity.
unable_to_fly.meaning_3: You might need to let go of control.
unable_to_fly.recurring_2: Your inner critic is too strong.
unable_to_fly.recurring_3: To learn to fly, you must accept falling.

recurring.short_answer_1: Recurring dreams point to an unresolved issue.
recurring.short_answer_2: The subconscious is trying to get your attention.
recurring.short_answer_3: It repeats until the message is understood.
recurring.why_2: An ongoing source of stress in your life.
recurring.what_to_do_1: Note the dream, record the details.
recurring.what_to_do_3: Think about what in life it might connect to.
recurring.what_to_do_4: Try to consciously address the issue.
recurring.when_stops_2: When you take action on the related matter.
recurring.when_stops_3: When you release the emotional burden.

personality.aries: Your Aries child has an energetic, brave and independent spirit. Leadership qualities come naturally and they love competition.
personality.taurus: Your Taurus child has a calm, determined and reliable nature. They love routine and stability, may resist change.
personality.gemini: Your Gemini child is curious, social and versatile. They constantly ask questions and want to learn everything.
personality.cancer: Your Cancer child has a sensitive, compassionate and intuitive nature. Family bonds are very important.
personality.leo: Your Leo child has a creative, generous and attention-grabbing personality. Leadership roles come naturally.
personality.virgo: Your Virgo child has an analytical, organized and helpful nature. They pay attention to details.
personality.libra: Your Libra child has a harmonious, fair and social personality. They avoid conflicts and try to create peace.
personality.scorpio: Your Scorpio child has an intense, determined and intuitive nature. They are deep thinkers and observers.
personality.sagittarius: Your Sagittarius child has an optimistic, adventurous and honest personality. They are fond of their freedom.
personality.capricorn: Your Capricorn child has a serious, responsible and ambitious nature. They may appear mature for their age.
personality.aquarius: Your Aquarius child has an original, independent and humanitarian personality. They think differently.
personality.pisces: Your Pisces child has a dreamy, compassionate and artistic nature. Their imagination is very rich.
personality.default: Your child has a unique personality.

learning_style.aries: Learns by moving and competing. Prefers short, fast activities.
learning_style.taurus: Learns through practical applications. Use tactile materials. Be patient.
learning_style.gemini: Learns by reading, talking and variety. Try different methods.
learning_style.cancer: Learns by making emotional connections. Stories and memories are effective.
learning_style.leo: Learns by performing and receiving appreciation. Give creative projects.
learning_style.virgo: Learns with systematic and detailed explanations. Proceed step by step.
learning_style.libra: Learns by collaborating and discussing. Partner work is effective.
learning_style.scorpio: Learns by researching deeply. Give independent projects.
learning_style.sagittarius: Learns by exploring and experiencing. Outdoor activities are effective.
learning_style.capricorn: Learns in a structured environment with goals. Show progress.
learning_style.aquarius: Learns using technology and in group projects. Try innovative methods.
learning_style.pisces: Learns with visual and musical materials. Allow them to use imagination.
learning_style.default: Discover your child's individual learning style.

social_style.aries: Takes the leader role. Loves competitive games. Patience must be taught.

social_style.cancer: Selective friendships. Needs trust. Loves playing at home.
social_style.leo: Popular and charismatic. Wants attention. There may be drama.
social_style.virgo: Selective and helpful. Forms deep bonds with few friends.
social_style.libra: Harmonious and diplomatic. Avoids conflicts. Teaches fair play.
social_style.scorpio: Intense and loyal friendships. Earning trust takes time.
social_style.sagittarius: Friends with different groups. Adventurous and fun.
social_style.capricorn: Mature friendships. Takes responsible roles. Help them relax.
social_style.aquarius: Unusual friendships. Loves group activities. Respect individuality.
social_style.pisces: Empathetic and compassionate. Boundaries must be taught. Needs alone time.

emotional_needs.aries: Freedom and independence. Teaching to cope with obstacles.
emotional_needs.taurus: Security and stability. Physical comfort and routine.
emotional_needs.gemini: Mental stimulation and communication. Feeling heard.
emotional_needs.cancer: Emotional security and family bond. Being accepted.
emotional_needs.virgo: Order and feeling useful. Doesn't have to be perfect.
emotional_needs.libra: Harmony and justice. Freedom to make choices.
emotional_needs.scorpio: Trust and emotional honesty. Right to privacy.
emotional_needs.capricorn: Success and approval. Areas of responsibility.
emotional_needs.aquarius: Acceptance and individuality. Right to be different.
emotional_needs.pisces: Unconditional love and understanding. Freedom to dream.

parenting_tips.aries: Give plenty of room for physical activity. Play competitive games but also teach losing.
parenting_tips.taurus: Create routine and introduce changes slowly. Offer tactile experiences. Keep your patience.
parenting_tips.gemini: Offer varied activities and nurture their curiosity. Keep conversations interesting.
parenting_tips.cancer: Create a safe and warm home environment. Allow them to express their feelings.
parenting_tips.leo: Support their creativity and appreciate their achievements. Offer stage performance opportunities.
parenting_tips.virgo: Give constructive feedback, avoid criticism. Understand their need for order.
parenting_tips.libra: Have them practice making decisions. Be fair and consistent.
parenting_tips.scorpio: Earn their trust and respect their privacy. Be honest because they detect lies.
parenting_tips.sagittarius: Give freedom space and offer adventure opportunities. Take their questions seriously.
parenting_tips.capricorn: Give responsibility but don't overload. Encourage fun. Celebrate achievements.
parenting_tips.aquarius: Celebrate their difference and respect their individuality. Approach with logic.
parenting_tips.pisces: Support imagination but also set boundaries. Be sensitive to emotional needs.
parenting_tips.default: Accept and support your child as they are.

You can have a nice time with your friends. Sharing will make you happy.

chakra.title: Chakra-Analyse
chakra.energy_cycle_content: Chakras sind nicht nur Energiezentren, sie sind Tore des Bewusstseins. Jedes Chakra ist eine Bruecke zwischen dem physischen Koerper und dem spirituellen Koerper. Sie auszugleichen ist der Schluessel nicht nur zur Gesundheit, sondern zum inneren Erwachen.

root.description: Muladhara - "Wurzelstuetze" - symbolisiert als 4-blaettriger roter Lotus. An der Basis der Wirbelsaeule gelegen, repraesentiert dieses Chakra Ueberlebensinstinkte, Sicherheit, Erdung und deine Verbindung zur materiellen Welt. Es ist mit dem Erdelement verbunden. Ahnenenergie wird hier gespeichert. Wenn es ausgeglichen ist, fuehlst du dich sicher und stabil.
root.balance_high: Du hast ein starkes Fundament, du fuehlst dich sicher.
root.balance_low: Du brauchst Erdung. Verbringe Zeit in der Natur.
root.affirmation: Ich bin sicher. Das Universum beschuetzt und unterstuetzt mich.

sacral.description: Das Sakral-Chakra ist mit Kreativitaet, Emotionen, Sexualitaet und der Faehigkeit zum Genuss verbunden.
sacral.balance_high: Deine kreative Energie fliesst, du bist im Einklang mit deinen Emotionen.
sacral.balance_low: Du hast Schwierigkeiten, deine Emotionen auszudruecken.
sacral.balance_mid: Belebe diese Energie mit kreativen Projekten.
healing_suggestions: Tanze oder bewege deinen Koerper frei
Verbinde dich mit Wasser - schwimmen, baden
sacral.affirmation: Meine Emotionen fliessen frei. Ich umarme meine Kreativitaet.

solar_plexus.description: Das Solarplexus-Chakra ist mit persoenlicher Kraft, Selbstvertrauen, Willenskraft und Identitaetsgefuehl verbunden.
solar_plexus.balance_low: Du musst dein Selbstvertrauen wieder aufbauen.
solar_plexus.balance_mid: Staerke dich durch Fokus auf deine Ziele.
healing_suggestions: Mache Uebungen zur Staerkung der Bauchregion
solar_plexus.affirmation: Ich bin kraftvoll. Ich habe volle Kontrolle ueber mein Leben.

heart.description: Anahata - "Ungeschlagener Klang" - symbolisiert als 12-blaettriger gruener Lotus. Das Herz-Chakra ist die Energie von Liebe, Mitgefuehl, Vergebung und bedingungsloser Akzeptanz. Es ist die Bruecke, die den physischen und spirituellen Koerper verbindet. Es ist mit dem Luftelement verbunden. Wenn es ausgeglichen ist, erfahrst du universelle Liebe und Mitgefuehl fuer alle Wesen.
heart.balance_high: Dein Herz ist voller Liebe, du bist in deinen Beziehungen harmonisch.
heart.balance_low: Zeige dir selbst und anderen Mitgefuehl.
heart.affirmation: Mein Herz ist voller Liebe. Ich bin offen zu geben und zu empfangen.

throat.description: Das Hals-Chakra ist mit Kommunikation, Selbstausdruck, Wahrheit und kreativer Stimme verbunden.
throat.balance_low: Du hast Schwierigkeiten, dich Gehoer zu verschaffen.
throat.affirmation: Meine Stimme ist wertvoll. Ich teile meine Wahrheit mit Liebe.

third_eye.description: Das Dritte-Auge-Chakra ist mit Intuition, innerer Vision, Vorstellungskraft und spirituellem Bewusstsein verbunden.
third_eye.balance_high: Deine Intuition ist stark, du bist in Einklang mit deiner inneren Stimme.
third_eye.balance_low: Lerne, auf deine Intuition zu hoeren.

card_insight.title: Was sagen dir die Karten?
card_insight.ancient_wisdom_intro: Reflection Card ist ein Spiegel des Unterbewusstseins. Diese Karten zeigen nicht die Zukunft, sondern Moeglichkeiten. Jede Ziehung offenbart das aktuelle Energiefeld und potenzielle Wege. Stelle den Karten eine Frage oder bitte einfach um Fuehrung. Vertraue deiner Intuition - die Antworten sind bereits in dir.
card_insight.kadim_note_content: Jede Reflexionskarte ist ein Archetyp des kollektiven Unbewussten. Wie Jung sagte, entstanden diese Symbole aus den gemeinsamen Traeumen der Menschheit. Wenn du eine Karte ziehst, beginnst du einen Dialog mit dem Universum. Die Antwort liegt nicht in der Karte selbst, sondern in der Verbindung, die du mit ihr herstellst.

yes_no_answers.positive_card_reversed: {card} kam umgekehrt. Obwohl normalerweise positiv, k√∂nntest du jetzt auf Hindernisse sto√üen.
yes_no_answers.negative_card_reversed: {card} ist in umgekehrter Position. Dies zeigt, dass negative Energien dominieren. Ich empfehle zu warten.
yes_no_answers.transformation_card: {card} ist eine Transformationskarte. Ja ist m√∂glich, aber sei auf unerwartete Ver√§nderungen vorbereitet.
yes_no_answers.positive_card: {card} tr√§gt positive Energie. Der Weg scheint frei zu sein.
yes_no_answers.neutral_card: {card} ist allgemein ein positives Zeichen. Vorsichtiger Optimismus ist angebracht.

spread_labels.past_energy: In der Vergangenheit war die Energie von {keyword} aktiv.

fool.name: Der Narr
fool.upright: Du stehst an der Schwelle einer neuen Reise. Lass deine Angste los und springe ins Unbekannte. Das Universum unterstutzt dich.
fool.reversed: Leichtsinn oder Angst halt dich zuruck. Handle nicht ohne nachzudenken, aber warte auch nicht zu lange.
fool.advice: Hore auf das, was dein Herz dir sagt. Manchmal ist die grosste Weisheit, zu akzeptieren, was du nicht weisst.

magician.name: Der Magier
magician.upright: Alle Werkzeuge sind in deinen Handen. Du hast die Kraft, das zu manifestieren, was du willst. Klare deine Absicht und handle.
magician.reversed: Du verschwendest moglicherweise dein Potenzial. Achte auf Manipulation oder Tauschung.
magician.advice: Halte alle vier Elemente im Gleichgewicht - Gedanke, Gefuhl, Aktion und Materie. Nutze deine kreative Kraft bewusst.

high_priestess.name: Die Hohepriesterin
high_priestess.upright: Vertraue deiner Intuition. Die Antworten sind in dir. In Stille und Zuhoren liegt grosse Kraft.
high_priestess.reversed: Du unterdruckst moglicherweise deine innere Stimme. Geheimnisse oder verborgene Informationen konnen ans Licht kommen.
high_priestess.advice: Zeit fur Meditation und innere Reise. Achte auf deine Traume und Intuitionen.

empress.name: Die Kaiserin
empress.upright: Fulle und Segensenergie ist stark. Du bist in einem Zyklus von Kreativitat und Fruchtbarkeit.
empress.reversed: Kummere dich um dich selbst. Vernachlassige dich nicht, wahrend du fur andere sorgst. Es konnte kreative Blockaden geben.
empress.advice: Verbinde dich mit der Natur. Schatze Schonheit. Zeige Mitgefuhl fur dich und andere.

emperor.name: Der Kaiser
emperor.upright: Zeit fur Fuhrung und Struktur. Disziplin und Entschlossenheit werden Erfolg bringen.
emperor.reversed: Ubermassige Kontrolle oder Starrheit. Flexibilitat ist notig. Konflikt mit Autoritatsfiguren.
emperor.advice: Setze starke Grenzen, aber sei kein Diktator. Ubernimm Verantwortung, aber gib anderen auch Raum.

hierophant.name: Der Hierophant
hierophant.upright: Traditionelle Wege und Institutionen sind wichtig. Ein Lehrer oder Fuhrer konnte erscheinen.
hierophant.reversed: Zeit, Traditionen zu hinterfragen. Finde deinen eigenen spirituellen Weg. Halte dich von Dogmatismus fern.
hierophant.advice: Weisheit kann uberall gefunden werden. Lerne von der Tradition, aber suche auch deine eigene Wahrheit.

lovers.name: Die Liebenden
lovers.upright: Eine wichtige Wahl oder Vereinigung. Liebes- und Harmonieenergie ist stark. Hore auf dein Herz.
lovers.reversed: Disharmonie in Beziehungen. Eine Wahl, die deinen Werten widerspricht. Innerer Konflikt.
lovers.advice: Wahre Liebe beginnt damit, dich selbst zu lieben. Bei deinen Entscheidungen hore auf Herz und Verstand.

chariot.name: Der Wagen
chariot.upright: Der Sieg ist nah. Deine Willenskraft und Entschlossenheit werden dich zum Ziel bringen. Du wirst Hindernisse uberwinden.
chariot.reversed: Kontrollverlust oder Richtungsverwirrung. Gegensatzliche Krafte ziehen an dir.
chariot.advice: Konzentriere dich auf dein Ziel. Balanciere deine inneren Konflikte. Halte durch auf dem Weg zum Sieg.

strength.name: Die Kraft
strength.upright: Wahre Starke liegt im Mitgefuhl. Du wirst Schwierigkeiten mit innerem Mut uberwinden.
strength.reversed: Mangelndes Selbstvertrauen oder unterdruckte Gefuhle. Entdecke deine innere Starke wieder.
strength.advice: Leugne nicht deine wilde Natur, liebe sie und zahme sie. Sanftheit ist keine Schwache.

hermit.name: Der Eremit
hermit.upright: Zeit fur Innenschau und Kontemplation. Entferne dich von Menschenmengen, finde dein eigenes Licht.
hermit.reversed: Ubermassige Isolation oder Ruckzug. Oder das Gegenteil - Flucht vor der Einsamkeit.
hermit.advice: In der Stille gibt es Antworten. Sei dein eigener Fuhrer, aber bleibe nicht vollig allein.

wheel_of_change.name: Rad der Ver√§nderung
wheel_of_change.upright: Grosse Veranderungen stehen bevor. Der Zyklus wendet sich. Die Aufwartsphase des Zyklus beginnt.
wheel_of_change.reversed: Die Abwartsphase des Zyklus. Auch das wird vorbei gehen. Sei geduldig.
wheel_of_change.advice: Die Hohen und Tiefen des Lebens sind naturlich. Sei dankbar auf dem Gipfel, geduldig im Tal.

justice.name: Die Gerechtigkeit
justice.upright: Gerechtigkeit wird geschehen. Ehrlichkeit und Wahrheit sind wichtig. Karma wirkt.
justice.reversed: Ungerechtigkeit oder Ungleichgewicht. Verantwortung vermeiden. Selbsttauschung.
justice.advice: Akzeptiere die Konsequenzen deiner Handlungen. Sei ehrlich - zuerst zu dir selbst.

hanged_man.name: Der Gehangte
hanged_man.upright: Warte und ergib dich. Schau aus einem anderen Blickwinkel. Opfer konnte notig sein.
hanged_man.reversed: Unnotiges Opfer oder Opferrolle spielen. Oder Widerstand gegen Hingabe.
hanged_man.advice: Manchmal ist der Weg vorwarts stehen zu bleiben. Andere deine Perspektive, die Antwort wird erscheinen.

death.name: Der Tod
death.upright: Eine grosse Transformation. Das Ende von etwas, der Beginn von etwas Neuem. Widerstand verlangert den Schmerz.
death.reversed: Widerstand gegen Veranderung. Unf√§higkeit loszulassen. Stagnation.
death.advice: Der Tod ist das Tor zur Wiedergeburt. Lass das Alte los, damit Platz fur das Neue ist.

temperance.name: Die Massigung
temperance.upright: Zeit fur Gleichgewicht und Harmonie. Geduld und Massigung bringen Erfolg. Heilungsenergie ist stark.
temperance.advice: Finde den Mittelweg. Durch das Mischen von Gegensatzen erreiche die goldene Synthese.

devil.name: Der Teufel
devil.upright: Deine Suchte und Angste halten dich gefangen. Stelle dich deinen Schattenseiten.
devil.reversed: Zeit, die Ketten zu brechen. Befreiung beginnt. Von der Sucht loskommen.
devil.advice: Du hast die Ketten angelegt, du kannst sie auch abnehmen. Tanze mit deinem Schatten, aber sei nicht sein Sklave.

tower.name: Der Turm
tower.upright: Plotzliche und zerstorerische Veranderung. Faule Fundamente sturzen ein. Aber das ist eine Reinigung.
tower.reversed: Vermiedene Katastrophe oder Widerstand gegen Veranderung. Innere Zerstorung.
tower.advice: Manchmal muss alles zusammenbrechen, damit das Wahre bestehen kann. Akzeptiere den Sturm.

star.name: Der Stern
star.upright: Zeit fur Hoffnung und Inspiration. Heilung und Erneuerung. Das Universum spricht zu dir.
star.reversed: Hoffnungslosigkeit oder Glaubensverlust. Trennung von der kosmischen Verbindung.
star.advice: Selbst nach der dunkelsten Nacht scheinen Sterne. Verliere nicht die Hoffnung.

moon.name: Der Mond
moon.upright: Das Unterbewusstsein taucht auf. Stelle dich Illusionen und Angsten. Achte auf Traume.
moon.reversed: Angste uberwinden. Aus Illusionen erwachen. Klarheit.
moon.advice: Schatten sind nicht real. Vertraue deiner Intuition, wahrend du in der Dunkelheit gehst.

sun.name: Die Sonne
sun.upright: Zeit fur Licht, Freude und Erfolg. Alles wird erleuchtet. Feier!
sun.reversed: Vorubergehende Schatten oder verzogerter Erfolg. Erneuere die Verbindung zu deinem inneren Kind.
sun.advice: Hab keine Angst, dein Licht leuchten zu lassen. Deine Freude ist ansteckend. Feiere das Leben!

judgement.name: Das Gericht
judgement.upright: Ein grosses Erwachen und Ruf. Abrechnung mit der Vergangenheit. Wiedergeburt.
judgement.reversed: Selbstzweifel oder in der Vergangenheit feststecken. Den Ruf nicht horen.
judgement.advice: Akzeptiere deine Vergangenheit, lebe deine Gegenwart, erschaffe deine Zukunft. Antworte auf deinen Ruf.

world.name: Die Welt
world.upright: Der Zyklus vollendet sich. Erfolg und Ganzheit. Ubergang auf eine neue Ebene.
world.reversed: Unerledigte Geschafte oder unvollstandige Zyklen. Ein weiterer Schritt ist notig.
world.advice: Jedes Ende ist ein neuer Anfang. Feiere deine Errungenschaften und bereite dich auf den nachsten Zyklus vor.

pisces.element_perspective: You're experiencing oneness with the universe. Creative inspiration is flowing. Ideal period for artistic expression.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.archetype_subtitle: Most frequently asked questions and answers
faq.personal_profile_subtitle: Everything you wonder about personal profiles
faq.card_insight_subtitle: What you need to know about reflection card cards
faq.archetype_a1: {sign} is one of the archetyp signs. Each sign has unique personality traits, strengths and weaknesses. Even if your Sun sign is {sign}, your rising sign and Moon sign also significantly influence your personality.
faq.archetype_a2: Sign compatibility depends on the entire personal profile, not just Sun signs. Generally, signs in the same element group (fire, earth, air, water) tend to be more compatible. For detailed compatibility analysis, synastry (comparative chart) analysis is recommended.
faq.archetype_a3: Daily reflections reflect general cosmic energies. Since each individual's personal profile is unique, personalized readings through personal profile analysis and transit reports provide more accurate results.
faq.archetype_q4: What does it mean if my rising sign is {sign}?
faq.archetype_a4: The rising sign (Ascendant) is the sign that was rising on the eastern horizon at your birth moment. It represents your outer appearance, how others perceive you, and your approach to life. You need to know your birth time to find your rising sign.
faq.personal_profile_a1: A personal profile (personal profile) is a cosmic map showing the positions of planets in the sky at the moment you were born. It shows which signs and houses the Sun, Moon and planets were in, and the aspects they make to each other.
faq.personal_profile_q2: What do I need to calculate a personal profile?
faq.personal_profile_a2: To calculate a personal profile, you need your birth date, birth time, and birth place. The more precise your birth time, the more accurately your rising sign and house placements can be calculated.
faq.personal_profile_q3: What if I don't know my birth time?
faq.personal_profile_a3: When birth time is unknown, noon (12:00) is typically used. In this case, the Moon sign and rising sign may be inaccurate. Planet sign placements and aspects between them will still be accurate.
faq.personal_profile_q4: What is the difference between house systems (Placidus, Whole Sign)?
faq.personal_profile_a4: Different house systems use different mathematical methods to divide the sky into 12 houses. Placidus is the most commonly used system. Whole Sign is an ancient system where each sign represents one house. Both systems are valid.
faq.card_insight_q1: Do reflection card cards show the future?
faq.card_insight_a1: Reflection Card cards don't show a definite future, but rather your current energy field and possibilities. The cards work like a mirror - reflecting your subconscious and situation. The future is shaped by your decisions and actions.
faq.card_insight_q2: How many cards are in a reflection card deck?
faq.card_insight_a2: A standard reflection card deck consists of 78 cards: 22 Major Arcana (great secrets) and 56 Minor Arcana (lesser secrets). The Minor Arcana has four suits (Wands, Cups, Swords, Pentacles) with 14 cards each.
faq.card_insight_a3: Reversed cards can indicate that the card's energy is blocked, internalized, or excessive. Some reflection card readers don't use reversed cards, while others consider them an important nuance.
faq.card_insight_q4: Can I read reflection card for myself?
faq.card_insight_a4: Yes, you can read reflection card for yourself. The important thing is to set a clear intention and interpret the cards objectively. Daily card pulls are an excellent practice for self-discovery.
faq.numerology_a1: Numerology is an ancient wisdom system that studies the symbolic and spiritual meanings of numbers. It is believed that the numbers in your birth date and name provide information about your life path, personality, and potential.
faq.numerology_q2: How is the life path number calculated?
faq.numerology_a2: Your life path number is found by reducing all digits in your birth date to a single digit (or master numbers like 11, 22, 33). Example: 15.05.1990 = 1+5+0+5+1+9+9+0 = 30 = 3+0 = 3
faq.numerology_a3: Master numbers are powerful vibrations that carry special potential and challenges. 11 represents intuitive enlightenment, 22 the master builder, and 33 the master teacher. These numbers are not reduced to single digits.
faq.numerology_a4: Each letter has a numerical value (in the Pythagorean or Chaldean system). By adding up the numerical values of the letters in your name, your expression number, soul number, and personality number are calculated.

rising_sign.title: What is rising sign?
short_answer_bullets: Rising sign is the archetyp sign that was rising on the eastern horizon at the moment of birth.
It determines how the outside world sees you.
It is different from your Sun sign and requires birth time to calculate.
what_it_tells_bullets: Your first impression: What people feel when they first see you.
Your physical appearance: Affects facial features and body structure.
Your defense mechanism: How you behave in new situations.
Your approach to life: How you interact with the world.
difference_from_sun_bullets: Sun sign: Your essence, who you are.
Rising sign: Your mask, how you appear.
Moon sign: Your emotions, what you feel.
how_calculated_bullets: Rising sign changes approximately every 2 hours.
Cannot be calculated if birth time is unknown.
why_important_bullets: It determines all houses in the chart.
It affects which houses the planets fall into.
It positions life areas from career to relationships.

moon_sign_today.title: What sign is the Moon in today?
short_answer_bullets: The Moon changes signs approximately every 2.5 days.
Whatever sign the Moon is in today shapes your emotions.
The Moon sign determines the daily emotional tone.
why_important_bullets: Shapes your needs for nourishment and rest.
daily_life_bullets: When Moon is in a fire sign: Energy rises, impatience may occur.
When Moon is in an earth sign: Good for practical matters.
When Moon is in an air sign: Communication and socializing are highlighted.
When Moon is in a water sign: Emotional depth increases.

saturn_return.title: Saturn Return
saturn_return.subtitle: The Great Teacher's Cosmic Lessons
saturn_return.kadim_content: Saturn, known as the Lord of Karma in self-awareness, demands discipline, responsibility, and maturity with each return. Approximately every 29.5 years, this cosmic teacher tests your foundations, destroys structures that don't serve your authentic self, and guides you toward building lasting achievements. The challenges are real, but so are the rewards for those who do the inner work.
saturn_return.in_return: You are in your Saturn Return

info.wisdom_quote: Saturn is the cosmic teacher. During its returns, it confronts us with our limits, responsibilities, and true selves.

active_messages.first: In this transition to adulthood, you are defining your career and life direction. This period may be challenging but will strengthen you.
active_messages.second: Transition to the second half of life. Your true priorities are becoming clearer, combining wisdom with experience.
active_messages.third: Time to review your legacy and life purpose. You are passing your wisdom to future generations.
active_messages.default: You are in an important life transformation.

interpretations.first: The First Saturn Return (ages 27-30) is the gateway to adulthood. During this time, you balance youthful dreams with reality. Important decisions about career, relationships, and life purpose are made. Saturn confronts you with your limits and helps you reveal your true potential.
interpretations.second: The Second Saturn Return (ages 57-60) is the transition to life's second half. During this time, you understand what truly matters. There is a shift from career peak to sharing wisdom. Physical and emotional health come to the fore.
interpretations.third: The Third Saturn Return (ages 87-90) is the time to evaluate your life legacy. Your wisdom and experiences are passed on to future generations. Spiritual maturity and inner peace are the gifts of this period.

theta_healing.title: Theta Healing
theta_healing.subtitle: Subconscious Transformation Practice
theta_healing.intro_description: Theta Healing is a healing technique aimed at transforming subconscious beliefs and energy blocks in the theta brain wave state (4-7 Hz). This practice helps you discover limiting beliefs and create positive changes.

intro.theta_state_content: Theta brain waves (4-7 Hz) are active during deep meditation, dreaming, and moments of creativity. In this state, direct access to the subconscious is possible and profound changes can be made.
intro.limiting_beliefs_content: There are belief patterns formed in childhood that unconsciously affect our lives. With Theta Healing, you can identify and transform these beliefs.
intro.energy_transformation_content: Energy blocks at the physical, mental, and spiritual levels are resolved. The healing process begins at the cellular level and spreads throughout your entire being.
intro.seven_planes_content: Theta Healing works with the 7 planes of existence in the universe: Minerals, Plants, Animals, Humans, Spirits, Laws, and Creative Energy.
